column2: "Huh?! What do you want? You got a problem with me being here? Ha ha ha! I'm an ARKS op, too, you know!"
"People oughta show some more spirit around here. When I see people moping around, I just wanna put 'em out of their misery."
"Ha ha ha! Relax, I'm not hungry enough to bite your head off here. There's a time and place for everything."
"Yeah, now this is more like it! Just like the good old days! Let's kick it up a few more notches!"
"I'm just getting warmed up. Don't be late for the party! You're the main dish, after all."
